products.productdescription:
Voile FR Cobalt Blue is a semi-translucent stylish, dark blue roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room.   Our Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in blue that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame Retardant and Pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, our customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on our made-to-measure blinds. Based in West Yorkshire, our roller blinds are carefully cut and assembled by our expert roller team.

products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant.  This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites.  
 
 This rich Midnight Blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dark blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control.

products.title: Stirlo Royal Blue
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.metadescription: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Ink Blue Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Ink Blue Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.productdescription: The Palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4118. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with Kingston Royal Blue Perfect Fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required
